Calgary Database

School Project


Website that takes the Calgary data json files in real time and outputs them through search field. Able to grab current traffic cams, traffic incidents with google map locations, crime stats and much more.

Live

Home Inventory

School Project


Website that keeps track of users home inventory within a database. Able to create an account that send a confirm email and validates. Admins are able to delete users, change names, and add categories
